about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner in property management
about.description: We are a passionate team dedicated to simplifying property management for owners, tenants and roommates.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2020, our platform was born from a simple vision: to revolutionize property management by making it accessible, efficient, and transparent for everyone.
story.paragraph2: We started by identifying the daily challenges faced by property owners, tenants, and property managers. From rent collection to property maintenance, through communication between parties, we have developed innovative solutions.
story.paragraph3: Today, we are proud to support thousands of users in managing their real estate assets, offering them modern and intuitive tools.

values.subtitle: The principles that guide our mission

clientProximity.description: We place our clients at the heart of our concerns with personalized and responsive support.

dedication.title: Commitment and Expertise

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quickly find answers to your questions

items.question: How can I create an account?
items.answer: Click on the 'Login' button then 'Create account'. Follow the steps to register.

items.question: What are your rates?
items.answer: Our rates depend on your needs. Contact us for a personalized quote.

items.question: How does the platform work?
items.answer: Our platform centralizes the management of your real estate properties in one place.

items.question: Do you offer customer support?
items.answer: Yes, our support team is available Monday to Friday from 9am to 6pm.
